output:
It takes some time to realize
It takes some time to understand the reason why
So many ways we didn't walk
So many words we didn't say
But surely we will find a way
That we can walk, maybe go a bit astray
That we can make something out of it
Maybe find a home
Maybe lead our lives toward a someplace alone
I don't know what I'm saying, maybe
Let's go together cause we're both stuck in between
Stuck inside the daily run, stuck in routine
Head on straight, let's hit the air
As easy going as free of care
Not as high as Inca rules
But close enough to see that up here
All that matters is just you and me
Where are you going, Maybelline?
All the time I thought that you and me were clean
Now it's time to change the gear
And speed our lives away from here
Cause this is not a place to stay
Why are you crying, Maybelline?
Oh believe me, all the world will be our sea
Come on and dream this dream with me
One more time we will be
So easy like a smile
So easy one more time
So easy flying by
Come on let's fly
Where are you going, Maybelline?
Please stay with me right now so we cannot be seen
Fly away, the stars are ours
Let's burst and turn to dust for now
Hey now you're laughing, Maybelline
You look so beautiful when you laugh so green
You'll be the princess and I'll wake you up
Oh, fly away
Waste to waste this summer night
But this one won't be wasted if we turn to light
This single time we'll take the dive
If it's the last this summer we will be alive
Unlike the other times before
We're not so anxious anymore
Regarding all the chances where we fail to score
Everything is counted when the world has ceased its turn
And now the sea was bound
Throwing forth the lessons that we had to learn
Take my hand and hold it tight
Let's save another summer night
So good to have you, Maybelline
So good to have all of you
I know I can't be sure
But you're the one I feel for
And I want to be with all your trust
Right into what is calling us
La la la la la
La la la la la
La la la la
La la la la
La la la la la
La la la la la
La la la la la
La la la la la
La la la la la
La la la la la
La la la la la
La la la la la
La la la la la
La la la la la
La la la la la
La la-la-la-la-la-la
